# The `PerfSupportPlugin` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Log perf jitdump events for each object (see <a href="https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/tree/tools/perf/Documentation/jitdump-specification.txt">https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/tree/tools/perf/Documentation/jitdump-specification.txt</a>). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Log perf jitdump events for each object (see <a href="https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/tree/tools/perf/Documentation/jitdump-specification.txt">https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/tree/tools/perf/Documentation/jitdump-specification.txt</a>).

Currently has support for dumping code load records and unwind info records.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/debugging/perfsupportplugin-h">PerfSupportPlugin.h</a>.
